title: Volunteer for COVID-19 Vaccination Trials near you
subtitle: Interested in supporting the development of vaccines? You can volunteer for a trial.

section1.title: COVID Trial Dash is a resource for people who want to join the fight against COVID
section1.content: We help you keep track of vaccine progress with timelines, terminology, and more, as well as provide information on ongoing vaccine trials near you!

section2.title: COVID Trial Dash is a resource for people who want to join the fight against COVID
section2.content: We help you keep track of vaccine progress with timelines, terminology, and more, as well as provide information on ongoing vaccine trials near you!
